snippet: Chelsea winger Eden Hazard repaid his manager Jose Mourinho for giving him a break in the sun by scoring one goal and creating the other in a scrappy 2-0 home win over 10-man Hull City in the Premier League on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Chelsea Rely on Hazard's Fresh Legs to Stay Out in Front
headline.main: Chelsea Rely on Hazard's Fresh Legs to Stay Out in Front

lead_paragraph: Chelsea winger Eden Hazard repaid his manager Jose Mourinho for giving him a break in the sun by scoring one goal and creating the other in a scrappy 2-0 home win over 10-man Hull City in the Premier League on Saturday.
